series.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
series.description:
Based on the Scifi American tv series Andromeda.
    
    The series is set thousands of years in the future, and revolves around the Systems Commonwealth, a constitutional monarchy based in a distant star system called Tarn-Vedra. Humankind is a part of The Commonwealth, having been discovered by its members thousands of years prior. The Commonwealth is based in three galaxies; The Milky Way, Triangulum Galaxy, and the Andromeda Galaxy, located 2.7 million light-years from the Milky Way Galaxy. Ships travel from one end of the Commonwealth to the other through slipstreams, following pre-guided roller coaster-like pathways through the cosmos to and from their destination.

STAR TREK TOS NOVELIZATIONS: Star Trek (under Bantam Books) Star Trek Log (The Animated Series under Ballantine Books) The Original Series Movie Novelizations (under Pocket Books) STAR TREK TOS SERIES: Shatnerverse (with TNG) Crucible Fortunes of War The Janus Gate Mere Anarchy My Brother's Keeper Rihannsu Star Trek TOS Starfleet Academy Vulcan's Soul Worlds Apart Worlds in Collision Star Trek New Earth Errand of Fury Errand of Vengeance Star Trek The Lost Years Vanguard Seekers For: Enterprise The Next Generation Deep Space Nine Voyager Other Star Trek Series: Star Trek Aventine Star Trek Titan Star Trek Typhon Pact Star Fleet Academy Star Trek The Captain's Table Starfleet Corps of Engineers Star Trek Day of Honor Star Trek Department of Temporal Investigations Star Trek Destiny Star Trek The Dominion War Star Trek Double Helix
series.note:
scroll to the very bottom for the publisher's list of all books ever published in each series: 
    http://pages.simonandschuster.com/startrek
